attributes.action: ensure that any e-petition gaining more than 250,000 votes is discussed in the commons as being in the public interest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in the interests of openness and new ways of working, we would like to ask the new prime minister to take this seriously.

i believe the government should be obliged to act on these petitions if a specified number of people agree.  The issue should be made to be discussed in the commons and the results clearly and easily accessible to the public on this site.
